name: Simple Character Model
description:
Mix between Sketch Outline and aaacups, with more than half the focus on the sketch model. Wanted something less anime-waifu that was stylistic. Going to use this as a base for more experimenting.

Using the word sketch will help the sketched look come through, haven't done much else. Good with body and clothing descriptions (needs heavy prompting to increase breast size), will definitely give nsfw without prompts against it.

Update: Added a Safetensor version.

meta.prompt: sketch of a pretty girl, nude , teenager, cute skirt, messy hair, sharp shadows, deep contrasting colors, nice hands, nice face, clean lines, high detail, colorful, full body
meta.negativePrompt: disfigured, ugly, weird hands, bad hands, more than 5 fingers, less than 5 fingers, weird, big boobs, text, signature, words, too many limbs, human skin tone

meta.prompt: sketch of a pretty girl, sharp shadows, deep contrasting colors, nice face, nice hands, big boobs, high detail, full body, 5 fingers, 2 arms, 2 legs, 1 head, 2 feet
meta.negativePrompt: small boobs, flat chest, disfigured, ugly, weird hands, bad hands, more than 5 fingers, less than 5 fingers, weird, big boobs, text, signature, words, too many limbs, missing limbs, extra limbs
